title: Palo Alto Networks, CrowdStrike, Pinduoduo: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Cybersecurity shares are on the rise, along with Chinese technology stocks
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up Tuesday, suggesting that gains in technology stocks will help send the S&P 500 to an all-time high. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of the opening bell.
Join Our Summer Stock-Picking Contest: Test your investing savvy against our Heard on the Street writers to predict the best-performing stock for the rest of 2021.
